name: Balbazu
description: The Balbazu is a tiny fiend known for its chaotic nature. It appears weak physically but possesses stealthy aquatic abilities and a terrifying blood-draining attack.
memorable: It can remain invisible underwater and drain blood from its targets, healing itself in the process.
goals: To drain the blood of its enemies and provide sustenance to other demons.
relations: Related to other demons it can assist, especially within aquatic environments.
environment: Typically found in aquatic areas or regions that support fiends.
strengths: Aquatic invisibility allows it to ambush prey, along with blood-draining capabilities to sustain itself.
weaknesses: Very weak in physical confrontations and vulnerable to mental attacks due to poor intelligence and charisma.
attacks: Utilizes a bite attack that can attach itself to a target, causing blood loss each turn.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Reservoir, which enables it to store drained blood and heal itself or aid other demons.
senses: Has darkvision, allowing it to see in darkness up to 60 feet.
skills: Proficient in perception, though its overall score is average.
additional_information: Immunities to poison and advantages against magical effects.
Can store blood within itself and share with nearby demons.
Very low strength makes it ineffective in physical combat.
Great ambush tactics due to stealth when submerged underwater.
Vulnerable to mental attacks due to low intelligence.
test_queries: stealthy aquatic fiend with blood powers
demon that can become invisible in water
